channel.title: This has been closed stop posting
channel.description:
MTP V2 was a very popular server that I hosted and released. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457959.msg3351330.html#msg3351330 It has reached thousands of downloads and I hosted it with 100+ always on. The main feature was pking and thieving at stalls, nothing else! I hope with some additions I will be able to get back to 100+ always on and more!
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/13yngpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/34y69uo.jpg[/img]
The goal of MTP is to be a popular pking server where you can join and start pking within minutes. All you have to do is buy your gear from the shops. Some skills have been added and I hope to add more features than just pking. The pking on this server is some of the best you will see.
Things Recently Added: -Full screen Client (webclient too, and you can use resized if you don't want full screen) -Korasi (with spec) and dragon defender -Fixed godswords
Skills Recently Added: -Mining -Woodcutting (Mining and woodcutting aren't 100%) -Agility -Crafting
Some of my ideas I hope to do Soon: -New Prayers -Dungeoneering Minigame -Npc minigame where you get points per kill and can then spend the points in a shop.
Anyone can become a part of the development team. Only a few people will be selected to be coders or designers. Everyone is welcome to be a Beta Tester of some of the new pking. I will be hosting this 24/7 off a Vps and I'll be coding everything I can. I'm not an expert and I hope I can get some coders that are a lot better than me (I'm not very good anyway.)
[b]New[/b]: People who can recruit several active players will be given donator or superdonator, depending on how many people you get. Anyone who increases our player population should 100% be rewarded.
Add me on msn: Marcbobishere@hotmail.com - Even if you don't want to join the team but maybe can help out with a couple things when I need some help
If you want to apply for a position other than beta tester fill this application out: 1. What are you best at doing (Coding, gfx, website, or other)? 2. Are you active? 3. Are you apart of more than one server? 4. Can you contribute new things and features? 5. How can I contact you? (I only use skype and msn so post one of those if you have.)
I'm not working with Rash & Runefx. This server is going to be a world 2/pking server for his. He is a really good coder and I hope he will help me out with a lot of things.

item.dc:creator: @Who_the_fuck Who the fuck
item.description:
@Who_the_fuck wrote:

  1. What are you best at doing (Coding, gfx, website, or other)? Graphic Design
  2. Are you active? Yes
  3. Are you apart of more than one server? Currently Working for one server but i always have time to do banners and logos for other servers/websites
  4. Can you contribute new things and features? Yea advertisement flyers banner what ever you would like
  5. How can I contact you? (I only use skype and msn so post one of those if you have.)
    Easiest of contacting me would be on msn which is uzami@live.com you can contact me to see more

Heres some of my work

Optimismv2.png1024×768

item.dc:creator: @WhyPlayLegit WhyPlayLegit
item.description:
@WhyPlayLegit wrote:

1. What are you best at doing (Coding, gfx, website, or other)?
Coding (Knowledge of Java and C++)
2. Are you active?
Yes.
3. Are you apart of more than one server?
If you don’t remember me, I am Ryan from ForeverPkers; OT: no.
4. Can you contribute new things and features?
I’m not too familiar with the current methods and structure of code for
RSPS’. But I’d be more than happy to help with logical errors, or even
take some time to read the code/tutorials to gain understanding over what kind
of methods the base uses.
5. How can I contact you? (I only use skype and msn so post one of those if you have.)
MSN: ryan.darius@yahoo.com

item.dc:creator: @saviour saviour
item.description:
@saviour wrote:

  1. What are you best at doing (Coding, gfx, website, or other)? I’m best at coding. (Still trying to learn more, am reading java for dummies to try to help me improve.:))
  2. Are you active? Yes, I am very active. I am always online, hence I have no life.
  3. Are you apart of more than one server? Currently, I am not.
  4. Can you contribute new things and features? I hope I can help you improve your server in some way. Help you keep a stable, good economy. (IF you do need help.) But I’m always on, and always willing to help. Edit I was also wanting to know, will you have skilling in your server? Because I would be willing to help work on that if it’s not pure pking.
  5. How can I contact you? MSN- ikonvicti@live.com (I added you.)
    – I am also learning all other types of programming languages. As with Java, I’m attempting to learn PHP, MySQL, and other languages.
